articles.author: Ryan Lattanzio
articles.title: DGA Awards 2024 Film Nominations: ‘Barbie,’ ‘Oppenheimer’ In - IndieWire
articles.description: “Maestro” director Bradley Cooper did not make the Directors Guild of America’s final five. Nor did Jonathan Glazer.
articles.content:
The Directors Guild of America has officially unveiled the film nominees for the 2024 DGA Awards. 
After announcing the TV nominations January 9, the Guild shared the film directors now in the runni… [+4439 chars]
